references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduced NeRF, a foundational method for novel view synthesis that heavily influenced subsequent 3D scene generation and editing research.

references.paper_title: pixelsplat: 3d gaussian splats from image pairs for scalable generalizable 3d reconstruction
references.reason: This paper introduced PixelSplat, a key method for efficient 3D Gaussian Splatting reconstruction that is leveraged for fast 3D scene generation and editing in SplatFlow.
This paper introduced denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), a fundamental technique used in many modern image generation models and adapted to 3D in SplatFlow.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduced a key method for high-resolution image synthesis using Latent Diffusion Models (LDMs), an architecture that SplatFlow builds upon.

references.paper_title: Repaint: Inpainting using denoising diffusion probabilistic models
references.reason: This paper introduced RePaint, a training-free inpainting method using DDPMs that is utilized for 3D editing in SplatFlow.
